text:
="preserve">American rapper Christopher George Latore Wallace (aka The Notorious B.I.G., Biggie Smalls or Biggie) was killed in a drive by shooting in Los Angeles, California on March 9, 1997. The murder was similar to Tupac's Murder.
Wallace was driving a GMC Suburban, a man in a 1994-96 Impala SS stopped on side of Wallace's SUV and fired shots at the Suburban. Four bullets hit Wallace.
